description: Describes a trait that MAY be applied to an Operation Object.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

A verbose explanation of the operation.
Allows referencing an external resource for extended documentation.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: A short description of the target documentation.

url.description: The URL for the target documentation. This MUST be in the form of an absolute URL. Constraints: format: uri.

anyOf.description: Unique string used to identify the operation. The id MUST be unique among all operations described in the API.
A declaration of which security mechanisms are associated with this operation.

items.description: Lists of the required security schemes that can be used to execute an operation

anyOf.description: A short summary of what the operation is about.
A list of tags for logical grouping and categorization of operations. Constraints: items must be unique.

items.description: Allows adding meta data to a single tag.

anyOf.description: A short description for the tag.
